API Documentation

Authentication Endpoints

POST
/api/auth/register
Register a new user

Request Body

−
{
  "username": "johndoe",
  "email": "john@example.com",
  "password": "password123",
  "firstName": "John",
  "lastName": "Doe",
  "bio": "Software developer"
}

Response

−
{
  "id": 1,
  "username": "johndoe",
  "email": "john@example.com",
  "profile": {
    "id": 1,
    "firstName": "John",
    "lastName": "Doe",
    "bio": "Software developer"
  },
  "token": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..."
}
POST
/api/auth/login
Login with existing credentials

Request Body

−
{
  "email": "john@example.com",
  "password": "password123"
}

Response

−
{
  "id": 1,
  "username": "johndoe",
  "email": "john@example.com",
  "token": "eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..."
}
